## Problem 1


```{r p1a}

ak <- readxl::read_xlsx(file.path(proj, "AK1991.xlsx"))

x <- matrix(data = c(rep(1,nrow(ak)), ak$edu), ncol = 2)
y <- ak %>% select(logwage) %>% as.matrix()

beta_conventional <- solve(t(x) %*% x)%*%(t(x)%*%y)

resid <- y - x %*% beta_conventional
sigma2_hat <- mean(resid^2)
beta_conventional_se <- sqrt(diag(sigma2_hat * (solve(t(x) %*% x))))

```
